QuestData.Title: The Savior of Kalimdor
QuestData.Description: To the Caverns of Time you go, $G Lord:Lady; $n. Anachronos awaits your return. Give him the eye of C'Thun as he will undoubtedly wish to place it in his master's collection.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Eye of C'Thun to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time.
QuestData.RewardText: The Master has left these for you, champion. From the timeless cache: A collection of artifacts spanning thousands of years - the choice is yours.
